content: patricia kristoffersen ollie the octopus crochet originals ™ cat toy designed by patricia kristoffersen ��������� ollie the octopus �oin with a slip st in front loop on round 10 chain 15 make more if you d like longer tentacles work 3 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 3 single_crochet in each st across for slightly cat toy looser tentacles work 2 single_crochet in each st across �lip st in next front loop on round 10 around �oin in first worked front loop �asten �ff 8 finished size 3 to 3 5 + �ou can start with magic_ring if desired instead of chain 2 needed ���� make 2 of each color hook 3 5mm hook and 1 50 mm hook �ith white and size 1 50 mm hook- yarn worsted weight yarn- approx 50 yards ��� 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook join with slip thread size 10 thread very small amount st in 1st single_crochet 6 stitch markers other materials needed ��� 2 2 single_crochet in each of 6 single_crochet around join 12 poly stuffing catnip bell / squeaker glue �asten off ���� �ith black and size 1 50 mm hook- chain 2 6 single_crochet in 2nd with yarn and 3 5mm hook working in rounds chain from hook �oin 6 �asten off chain 2 or magic_ring �lue pupil to white of eye �lue eye to body �lace as shown round 1 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook or magic_ring 6 do not join put a marker on the first st made on each round now and throughout round 2 2 single_crochet in next 6 sts 12 single_crochet round 3 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st 6 times 18 single_crochet round 4 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st 6 times 24 single_crochet round 5-9 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24 single_crochet if you want toy a bit larger work this round a few more times round 10 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in back loop only of next st 8 times the front loops will be used to make tentacles 24 single_crochet- 8 are in back lps decrease uses 2 single_crochet- insert hook in each of next 2 scs- pulling up a loop in each yo and draw through 3 loops on hook round 11 single_crochet in next single_crochet decrease over next 2 single_crochet 8 �opyright 2024 �atricia �ristoffersen times 16 st �or personal use only round 12 decrease 8 times 8 sts at this point stuff with poly catnip a little bell etc �lease direct people to my site to download their own if using catnip put in a piece of thin cloth or piece of copy of this pattern �hank you hosiery to contain catnip �ested by �heila �ray round 13 decrease 4 times 4 sts fasten_off weave in and out of these 4 sts and pull https //www ravelry com/stores/patricia- kristoffersen-designs
